title: Erigon not syncing - could not connect with peer (failed to dial)
body:
E**dit (more context):** 

Now that the internal light client is default, when using an external cl it looks like the --externalcl flag must be supplied.

**Reported via Discord, user states:**

_I've already deleted the snapshot folders and redownloaded them. Ive reset headers. Resynced Prysm. Its doing this headers stage and when i query the rpc it doesnt raise the block number for already 24h. Externalcl Prysm. Querying the rpc tells me blocknumber is 16038174. Eth_syncing says false._
